summary: Tom is left in charge of a priceless magical ring by his young wizard master. He is then horrified when the ring gets stuck on Jerry's head, who then runs off into the city.
cast: Jeff Bennett|Frank Welker|Charlie Schlatter|Jim Cummings|Maile Flanagan|Jess Harnell|Maurice LaMarche|Tress MacNeille|Tara Strong|Billy West
director: Director: James T. Walker (as James Tim Walker)
title: Tom y Jerry: El anillo mágico
